reviewText: As a fan of this show(who watches it every chnce I get) I think that the DVD of the best of Season 1 is great. It highlights all the best episodes from the first season. I also really like the cool info about military gear and tactics past, present and future and the fact that Ermey presents it in a very cool way(this guy is a funny as hell).I highly recommend this DVD for history and military buffs
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have missed Mail Call being on the History Channel, and am glad that these "Best of..." series have been put out. They are a huge hit with my sons, who watch them and learn from them just as I do. R. Lee Ermey is a superb host, combining his over the top persona with a very entertaining take on the questions fielded from viewers. The DVD's themselves are good quality, and the extras (especially the promo spots for the show) are very entertaining.
summary: A home run hit for the Gunny

reviewText: If you are a fan of R Lee Ermey from Full Metal Jacket and are interested in military hardware past and present this is a great buy.  The DVD extras leave a little to be desired, but Ermey's sense of humor combined with his giddiness for the military equipment make this DVD alot of fun.  An example of the witty sense of humor is the take off of MTV's cribs showing Ermey's command tent from the series.  An ex Marine drill instructor combined with MTV style left me rolling on the couch.  I recommend for anyone who wants to start learning about military equipment to people who have knowledge already.  Semper Fi
